column5: Built in 2013 a two story home featuring 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, sleeps 20 and a great open concept living room big enough to accommodate all your friends and family and give them the majestic endless panoramic views of the Ocean. Two Master suites each with it's private bathroom and access to the 2nd floor balcony to enjoy those beautiful sunrises and sunsets while sipping on your favorite drink.
